title: Questions regarding preseason
body: Will your season 8 rank be affected by your preseason rank or your season 7 rank? Also if preseason does affect(effect idk which one) your rank, is it possible to maybe disable ranked for the first week or so, to allow people to get used to the runes changes and stuff?

replies.body: Your new ranks are somewhat determined by your previous rank. When you're doing your placements for the next season, it takes the previous rank into account a little but is still mostly determined by winning or losing those placements.
